revision.text: Possibly: An essay on crimes and punishments, Translated from the Italian; with a commentary, Attributed to Mons. de Voltaire, Translated from the French. (Cesare, marchese di Beccaria; Voltaire). (London : Printed for J. Almon, opposite Burlington-House, Piccadilly, MDCCLXVII. [1767]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2055673~S1
